titles.title: State and Local Sales Tax Deduction Expansion Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to ensure that all taxpayers have the ability to deduct State and local general sales taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
12/9/2008--Introduced.
State and Local Sales Tax Deduction Expansion Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow all individual taxpayers a tax deduction for state and local general sales taxes (current law allows taxpayers an election to deduct either state and local income taxes or sales taxes).
